website_summaries.verdict: The test for people who need results quickly
pros: Low-cost test including shipping to the laboratory
The test takes 2 days, which suits people who need answers now
cons: The test only has 22 markers – other options on the market have more
The markers point to the accuracy of the test

customer_reviews.title: Best DNA test out there! No extra lab fees! It’s all included!
customer_reviews.text: This DNA test is the way to go! So much more affordable and so easy to use! I received the test, sent it out the following day, and had my results less than a week later! Turned out exactly how I knew it would but sometimes you have to prove things to people that like to lie. So affordable and no extra lab fees! The accuracy was right on too! Thank you DNA direct! It was a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Deviney Price

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The process was incredibly simple and their customer service is great. I had to call twice and the person I spoke to was very knowledgeable and helpful. I spent the last year of my life thinking I was the father and this test saved me a lot of additional heartache and money. Would recommend to anyone with doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This IS NOT a 2-day process. It’s closer to 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars, I would. It’s been almost 2 weeks and I still don’t have results. Mailed out on 2/06/19 and STILL don’t have results and it’s now 2/16/19. They’re closed on the weekends, so it will most like be 2/19/19 before I get results. That’s 13 days. Huge false claim to say it’s 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bandme

customer_reviews.title: It’s not mine!
customer_reviews.text: I knew something wasn’t right when my SO gave birth to an African American baby. (We’re both white). She swore it was mine and as much as I wanted to believe her, I ordered the test without her knowledge and sure enough, the baby wasn’t mine after all.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience waited days for the results only for them to get back to me saying that a sample was compromised and we need to pay a extra 50 dollar fee to retest it, no refunds. So I paid 80 dollars for nothing and now they want an extra 50. Absolutely not
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!! FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally fake product. I was sent a DNA direct solutions envelope with two double pack of sterile polyester tipped applicators. The envelope for the collection samples was already completely filled out (minus the collection date) with another guys name
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions, fast results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Test kit instructions were very easy to follow. Came with everything we needed, including a return envelope which already had paid postage. Put the kit in the mail on Monday and received the results by Friday through my email. Very pleased with the service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: the Golden Hanger

customer_reviews.title: Happy to know he is ours
customer_reviews.text: Arrived tested and sent back. Received confirmation email when they received it. Sent the test results 2 business days after receiving. Note, read closely because I saw a number of complaints by reviewers who didn’t take the time to read the product terms. They will notify you of the results 2 business days after they receive it. Not within 2 days of sending, 2 days of thinking about it. Simply 2 business days which if you don’t know is mon thru Friday. If they received it on Friday then most likely you will get your results on Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Smith

customer_reviews.title: This test is crap
customer_reviews.text: The test was a failure says I have 0%probability of bring the father when it came down to me white American and a Mexican and the little girl is white with dirty blonde hair so how am I not the father
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: My sons girlfriend lied and said he was the father and I wanted to be sure, so I ordered the test and we got the truth, she even said the test was wrong but after doing a state ordered test we found out this test was right
customer_reviews.author: R Ellis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE- FAST TURN AROUND-EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I recently did an ancestry test on myself never knowing who my father was I had absolutely no idea as to who he even is. The ancestry connected me to a man who I found out is my uncle and I ordered the paternity test to confirm his brother was my father. I mailed my test on a Thursday evening it arrived to the company on a Monday morning and I got my results Wednesday afternoon so after 41 years of never knowing who my father is I found my father I can't stop crying I am so happy right now to start this new journey.
customer_reviews.author: Merl W.

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE FATHER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After years of wondering we decided to get the test and do it ourselves. The mother was sure my fiancé was the father but would never prove it. The test came back negative and when we told the mother she said thank you for taking the test I’ll handle it.I am so glad we got the results back and they came back quick.This test saved me and my fiancé a lot of pain now we can move on with our lives and have comfort that we know the truth now.They are very responsive if you have any questions they are sure to answer them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Barros

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Unless your willing to pay an extra $49 on top of the original $80 because they cant read your test. Do not buy I've done everything the instructions asked me to do but some how it's the customers fault..
customer_reviews.author: Devon Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: No results yet-test was taken about 2 months ago
customer_reviews.text: This test was inexpensive, but you get what you pay for. So far, no results have been given. It's been nearly 2 months. I have no confidence in this company whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Musiqua

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This process was so incredibly easy. Bought the DNA test and it was delivered 2 days later. Did the swab then mailed the whole test to the other recipients. She did the swab and mailed the package in the envelope provided the next day. In slightly over a week from start to finish a 30 year old puzzle was solved. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Important detail not on instructions
customer_reviews.text: Minus two stars for annoyance. What is not mentioned is that you have to register the test before you send it in. One would think if they would have something like "sign the consent form" on the instructions that they would have an equally as important step as "register the test" on there as well. Needless to say I now have to buy another test to send in. That being said, they did get my test in only a couple days and called me as soon as they got it. So they do get props for promptness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam. Request more money after submitting.
customer_reviews.text: Submitted test only to receive an email requesting more money for additional tests. Nothing in the original paperwork or package stated this would be a possibility. It’s scam.
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the test on October 10, I received the test on October 12. We took the test on the 12th and I sent the test off on the 15th. It reached the lab on the 21st. I received my results by email on the 23rd through email at 6:05 p.m. EST The process was very quick and easy. The instructions were very clear, and that's part of the reason why the test was easy to use. I'm very pleased that we chose this company to fullfil our paternity needs. I definitely recommend this company! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ayana Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed! Received my kit in 2 day’s. It’s very discreet for both incoming and outgoing. Very basic and simple to use. Includes instructions and everything you need to swap and send in for testing. I mailed the test on a Thursday evening and on Monday afternoon I received an email that said my kit was received and results would be sent in 2 business days. On Wednesday afternoon I got the results emailed In a pdf format. Using the test again & I will review after as well. No hidden fees, lab is included! Fast turn around! 2 big thumbs up for me!
customer_reviews.author: COMBATBARBIE365

customer_reviews.title: Fast results!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on a Wednesday, arrived thrusday and got results the next tuesday afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Cristino Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Got the product quickly, performing and returning the test was easy, and results were received in my email in 5 days from dropping it in the mailbox. EVERYTHING was discreet. Best for me, it was the answer I wanted! The worst part was the waiting; 5 days felt like 5 centuries. I was anxious, you will be too. The results are quick, clear and concise. Whatever your results say, I hope it’s what you wanted. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: A Conscientious Observer

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I haven't received any results yet. It's been a week. Far cry from 2 business days. I even emailed a small paragraph. Nothing. I'd really like to get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy hodge

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 kits to find out via lab that they were unable to process both collections. I followed the instructions carefully and they could only advise me that I conducted the collection of the samples wrongfully; when in fact the representative stated I should’ve let the samples air dry prior to inserting in the collection envelope: which is not noted in their policy or instructions to begin with. All I asked was for a discount to resubmit my samples and they stated no. Keep in mind in my line of work I collect samples all of the time and never had an issue. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Fast results! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 32 year old woman who was looking for my biological father. I did the DNA ancestry but wanted to make sure 100% and I sent in our sample and within two business days after sending in the results I received the results. He was the papi! If I need another dna test I will definitely buy this. Please REGISTER online before sending in the sample and you WILL get your results in two business days. So simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nells

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: The results came in late but we move off two different standard times.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: excellent, quick and easy testing, results within 2 buisness days!
customer_reviews.text: Fast to receive, easy to do, fast to send, and results came in via email promptly as stated. Customer service was great and prompt as well. I recommended this test for piece of mind to anyone that has even the slightest of doubts. As for the reviews that said they took very long to get their results, I think it could be due to samples not being taken properly or not being standard. If you follow the directions as stated in your kit, you shouldn’t have any delays and regardless of results, the kit is great! Highly recommend. Great value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Everything that could've went wrong went wrong for me. I wouldn't recommend. Can't say if it's accurate or not as I never got my results. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jimnelly Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Smooth transaction
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was completed a few days later. I made sure to register online immediately and filled out info on envelopes before swabbing. Sent per instructions and they actually got it quicker than I thought they would and sent me confirmation email that they had it and 48 hours later they emailed the results to me. Could not have asked for a easier way to find out paternity !! Will highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: joseph lepore

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to use it but apparently it saved me from raising a kid that isn't mine, if I hadn't bought this and asked for a DNA test from the woman.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bush

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy to do
customer_reviews.text: If you need a DNA test for any reason the DNA direct is a great and easy test. The instructions are are really simple and straight forward and the price (compared) to other test is reasonable. I registered my information on a Thursday, mailed the swaps on a Sat & received my information on a Thursday. I wasn't expecting the results so fast. Everything was easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: went somewhere else after ridiculous wait and found positive when theres said negative on paternity test then had to go to third and to confirm positive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I originally went to Walgreens to inquire about a paternity kit. The kit was $30 PLUS $139 lab fee so I started looking at other less expensive options. I found this one and decided to give it a try. I got it very quickly and did the test the same day. I sent the test back on a Saturday from the post office, it arrived to their lab on Monday and I had results on Wednesday. It was very fast and simple. Glad my in laws will finally stop trying to convince my husband she isn’t his. I definitely recommend this for a peace of mind test. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on a Thursday and received the kit on Friday. Did the test on Saturday and put it in the mail same day. Received an email on Tuesday saying they received the kit and I would receive results in 2 business days. Received the results today, exactly 2 business days later as promised. The company has been very professional. And to have ordered and received results within a weeks time is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this. Make sure you register. I finally got results after six years of doubt. I mailed the test on Monday 10/21/19. They emailed me Wednesday 10/23/19 saying they have it and it will take two business days. Then today I got the results 10/28/19. So it took about a week but I’m okay with that I’m just that they where keeping in touch with me and I got results.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend DNA Direct Solutions
customer_reviews.text: I highly reccomend using this product. I have been trying to get these tests done for quite a while but due to timing and schedules it always got postponed. I was hestitate to use this method but I am sure glad I did. I did pay additional at USPS for the test to be overnighted so I cannot speak to the delivery time of the postage they provide however in less than 48 hours I got my results. Thank you DNA Direct Solutions!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Yglesias

customer_reviews.title: Easy as pie to use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product took about 2 minutes to write in the information and do the samples. You have to register on the website first before sending off the samples. Sent it off the next day got a reply from the testing facility that they received the package in, got the results back in 2-3 business days. They only release the results to your email so to keep things private.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Non complicated
customer_reviews.text: Trying to not give an emotional response to this product based on results lol. It was easy from the word go. Directions were simple. Process was simple. Results actually showed the dna numbers and the results were given in a timely manor. This gave my father much needed closure to questions surrounding my conception 37 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Berry

customer_reviews.title: Court backed accuracy!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say when I found out I had a 50/50 shot of being my child's father (over a year later) I immediately ordered this kit to know. Results came back in 2 days and I was excluded as being the father. Went to court and the tests they did had the same result. highly highly recommend this kit, that's easy easy to use, for a quick answer we all deserve.
customer_reviews.author: Bookguy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered this paternity test kit!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! The test arrived in one day! The kit was basically four cotton swabs and an instruction sheet. I mailed it off to the lab on a Friday. I got the email notification on Monday that they received my kit and they’re processing it. I got my results in two days as promised. This test put my mind at ease and getting the results so fast is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Della71

customer_reviews.title: Fast. Easy and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Fast turn around. Received package on January 18th. Easy testing process. Mailed samples the next day. Arrived at testing site 2 days later. Another 2 days and the results were emailed to me. Worth the peace of mind the results provided. If you have questions regarding paternity... Don't hesitate to purchase this item. Great price and lab fees with return shipping included.
customer_reviews.author: JERMAINE DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy !!
customer_reviews.text: the package arrived on January 19th instructions were simple enough . I collected my brothers DNA swab n his 2 week old sons and I sent it the same day. It was Martin Luther king day on the 20th so the mail wasn’t picked up till the 21st and today I received the results. Super fast results!!! You can’t put a number on piece of mind!! So worth the money ...
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Without getting into personal details this is a great product, the service was phenomenal and the return speed of the results was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Results are worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have to register kit online in order for them to test it, tests back in two days, emailed results,
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dobson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Swab not sealed!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was discreet! Which is good but the 1 swab wasn't sealed so I don't know if it's still sterile, I'll give update when I got result!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful experience and purchase
customer_reviews.text: A sweet little baby boy was born on June 27th and there was a possibility that my son was the father. I bought this and sent it to him. He and bitty dude got swabbed. My son mailed kits off late on Tuesday September 17th and this Monday, September 23rd the test results came back already and confirmed he was the daddy by 99.99998%. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lil Momma G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Results came fast. I would recommend this to someone who doesn't want to pay an arm and a leg for a quick DNA test
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Accurate, Simple and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Swabbed my daughter the day after she was born along with her dad and mailed results in that same day, which was Saturday...by Wednesday, 5pm, I got the results via email. Very impressed and relieved by this kit and the service of the company, I spoke to an actual American representative the same day the results came in.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to decipher
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy, except when we received the results they were extremely confusing to read. Would definitely recommend sending a “how to read guide” with the test results! But all in all it was a good deal for very accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We had next day delivery of this item through Prime. Dropped off the sample kit in the mailbox on Saturday and had the emailed results by Wednesday. Also received an email when the samples were received. Very fast, professional and efficient. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CatLover704

customer_reviews.title: Helped find my dad
customer_reviews.text: I’m 30 and had been recently told my dad isn’t my biological dad. Was given name of other guy and talked with him and decided to buy this test to see if the story we were told was true or not. Test came quickly and was very discreet. I did my swab and than he did his. Took about 4 days to get results but I now know whom my real father is. Opened up a whole new world for me. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Parker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my in laws were giving me a hard time about whether my baby was actually my husbands. My husband didn’t care for it since he knows the baby is his, but I bought this and the turn around for results was quick. It was easy to use and I swabbed a one week old baby so with that being said, the simplicity was great. Got the results back with a 99.9999% and to understand the allele information I just googled and it was easy to understand. I recommend using this test because of its economic price and quick results.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Acosta

customer_reviews.title: He's my boy
customer_reviews.text: Got results within a week of sending samples. Everything was easy just follow the instructions, and I called customer service twice and someone answers quickly. 99.9996% sure he is my boy, and that's awesome! I love my son!! and the piece of mind that this test has given me, as I thought my son looked nothing like me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Felton

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this as proof of paternity to add my daughter to my will being that i had a daughter previously that i was excluded qs the father. Did exactly what it was supposed to do. btw, my daughter has 66% of my genetics and only 33.333% of my wifes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ponthieux

customer_reviews.title: The accuracy is 99.9999999%
customer_reviews.text: Even though I didn’t need this product for myself, I brought it to show the accuracy in DNA testing. It was 100% accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: After getting the box, and doing the swabs... it took about a week for the DNA samples to reach the lab from Chicago. Then 2 days for the results to be sent to my email address. I'm very impressed with the speed and price of this product, compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: So quick & easy
customer_reviews.text: It was such a fast process, I got the results like 2 days later. There was a DNA Direct branch here in my town so I took it over there & my two days started as soon as they received it. Collecting the samples were easy, just a swab. The price covered everything, including lab fees. They gave me the results through email so I could print them or forward them or whatever. Would definitely use this again if I need DNA work done.
customer_reviews.author: KeiErikah Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fast , private and professional
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product, results in 2 days from when the lab receives it. upgrade the shipping because that slows it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Fast,accurate, easy instructions. I returned the DNA kit on a Wednesday and I received my results via email Wednesday even of the following week. I would recommend this test to anyone who needs proof.I received just the results I knew all along I'm so happy it's over with and I am definitely pleased with my results thanks DNA Direct!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: It works. Lab results as promised. It really worth it. Now I know the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of kit missing
customer_reviews.text: Kit arrived with most pieces missing. Only received swabs and collection envelopes. No instructions, return envelope or consent forms. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend. Easy to use, results returned quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and very self-explanatory. All the fees are included so that’s a huge plus! They send you the results via email in PDF format. I wish DNA tests were not so expensive to begin with, but as far as this one goes, great value for the money! Gave us the piece of mind we needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Erika GustafsonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: The test was easy to use. The directions were easy to understand. The process went smoothly. The company that processes the tests is very professional and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Dreaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy if you follow instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, and accurate. REGISTER first and follow instructions. Super easy if you read the instructions. We sent the kit back on a Friday, Monday was a holiday and they received it Tuesday. We got results Thursday, so 2 days like they stated. Results were accurate, I knew her dad was.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this test on a Wednesday, did everything as the packaged stated and put in mail on Thursday. They sent a confirmation email Monday they’ve received it. I got my test results back on Wednesday. This was so easy and convenient and we didn’t have to spend $200 to go to a clinic to get our 99.9% test results! I’d recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Saved a ton of money. Not my sons kid !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donal campbell

customer_reviews.title: Long wait time and wanting more money for nothing
customer_reviews.text: Did the test first thing in the morning, waited almost a week for the results after sending it out same day as test was performed only to get an email stating the sample was to degraded to test, and I'll have to pay an additional $49. To retest customer service provided ABSOLUTELY no help WHATSOEVER to remedy the issue instructions followed to the exact degree waited a year to know the truth now I'll continue to wait or use a different company to test next time
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Took 2 test. 2 negative results. Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I've taken 2 test with 2 negative results. Which is great for me. But really dont know how accurate it is. I was sure one was probably mines but the other one came out the blue. But the test come back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took to long.
customer_reviews.text: It took longer to get the results than the description said.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi L Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Maybe try a legit facility if this is really important to you
customer_reviews.text: Not sure that this is accurate. I think I'll try somewhere else to make sure. Was used on 2 consenting adults and results were not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best DNA out here
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews and I love amazon. I want to start of by saying I was nervous purchasing this product. I can say it was worth the money $$. Everything was amazing and gave me the information within 2 days thanks again I promise this is a True Review.
customer_reviews.author: Tangela S

customer_reviews.title: I asked for a granparenting dna test and get told I need more money
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad. I purchase this looking for a kit to test child and grandmother after I sent It to the lab i get a message stating that the kit is on hold .. I dont understand what difference it make if it has the option of testing the grandparent that I'm getting charge more money.
customer_reviews.author: keli

customer_reviews.title: She cheated!
customer_reviews.text: The test came back as 0.000, so we did a second one in the doctors office because we couldn't believe the results, still came back 0.000. It was very accurate. I highly recommend, but if you are going to do a 2nd test, dont bother. Its a waste if money to do both.
customer_reviews.author: Jestina eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Easy, professional and fast results
customer_reviews.text: Easy directions and shipping package included. Got an email when they received the package at the lab and had the results and result breakdown emailed to me two days after they received the package. This stressful experience could not have gone easier.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, got the results 2 days after the lab received the samples. The lab sends the email of the results between 4 & 5 pm mountain standard time. Very pleased with the entire process.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don't wonder, find out for sure in about a week!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was very easy to use. We did the test on a Tuesday evening, mailed it Wednesday and received notification that the lab received it Friday. I received the email with the results the following Tuesday. Best $80 I have ever spent to find out for sure that my son is a father. I am a grandmother!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Lee Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Get your questions answered!
customer_reviews.text: This test changed my life. I'd been looking to have some questions answered after 35 years. I found my Dad. The test was easy to administer and the directions were straight forward. Results were FAST B
customer_reviews.author: V. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Customer service reply’s quick product is easy n accurate . Took 8 days to get results including shipping
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: Took too long to get results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. However, it took WEEKS to hear anything. We had to call and finally get the results emailed to use. The return time was awful!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: If you are outside USA don t buy this kit
customer_reviews.text: They send my money back and not the item because they can not do it to Mexico. To bad because i was going to do the test in Mexico and then travel back to USA to send the test for results. They didn t consider that option.
customer_reviews.author: Claireana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful addition to our fathers day! The peacce of mind is a wonderful thing. I had reviewed several before purchasing this and the detail in the results were awesome.

customer_reviews.title: So happy for the peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Everything as promised: Easy to use Easy to mail off Results within 2 buisness days...almost to the hour.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to ease your mind
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product recieved on a Monday swabbed and sent back same day and got results on that Friday two business days after the recieved the samples as advertised. Couldn't be happier with results now i know without out a doubt. Good price easy instructions make sure to register before sending in samples. Even have the smallest doubt highly recommend to just ease your mind .
customer_reviews.author: Louis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 7 days for results
customer_reviews.text: It took 7 business days for the results. There is nothing about this that is a 2 day process.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT an ancestry kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not understand that this did not show ancestry. I did not realize that this was to show that I am the mother of my son!!! I wasted $100 on this product.
customer_reviews.author: balakhr

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest DNA test
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest DNA test I’ve found. Was super easy and came with instructions. Got my results back in 4 days as I got the package on a Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Trinidy Richards

customer_reviews.title: Quick and clear results!
customer_reviews.text: It was so convenient, quick and easy! One week from start to finish! We received the package within 2 days with Amazon Prime, mailed it on a Monday, received email confirming the lab received it on Wednesday, and received clear and immediate results that Friday! So pleased and happy we chose this product for such an important answer we needed for peace of mind. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: User111056

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this purchase was 100% perfect. The lab got it soon and in 2 days I got my results by email like they said. There is also people from the lab you can talk to for any questions they were super professional at all times. I'm really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Super fast results
customer_reviews.text: Very very satisfied with this kit! Sent the envelope back on Thursday and had the results the following Wednesday!! Amazing service and for the results we were hoping for!! Would highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stazzone

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price - accurate fast results
customer_reviews.text: After doing much research, I found this test to be our best value. We did the test by following the instructions provided on a Saturday, mailed it in on Monday, received a confirmation email of its arrival Thursday morning and test results were emailed back Monday afternoon. Very pleased with the whole process and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, fast results, very easy to use, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This test is absolutely wonderful. I got the results I was looking for. Did the test I shipped it out on Tuesday 8/4/20 got my confirmation email that it was received on 8/14/20 (paid 7 dollars for faster shipping) and got my results on 8/11/20 @ 8:40am as promised. Highly recommend if you are looking for paternity.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received this kit with very clear instructions. We got our kit registered, swabs done and sent in, we had an email when it was received and had our results in two business days.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Rash

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try
customer_reviews.text: They don’t do dual testing they laboratory is 2.8 stars and they have multiple cases of false reports I won’t trust them I would go to a court house

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Im am glad this Dna test is affordable and convenient it gave me the results that I have been looking for thank you again Dna Direct my mind is now at ease.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to register online first for no delays
customer_reviews.text: I got the results I needed and now able to take legal action and get help for my baby by all means. I will definitely buy again if needed. Sent off Saturday and got results Thursday

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave amazon reviews but I have to for this. This test was incredibly easy to complete and the results were emailed less than 36 hours after they were received. Results were easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to confirm the paternity of my granddaughter. It was inexpensive and easy to use. Their customer service was friendly and informative.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use and quick results!
customer_reviews.text: Great product highly recommend! Sent it off may 27th which was actually a holiday it was recieved tht following monday I recieved an email letting me know it had been recieved. Got results by Wednesday afternoon!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the professionalism of the whole process the promptness and over exacution of the answers you need being provided was outstanding will definitely recommend to family, friends and anyone else in need of seeking answers
customer_reviews.author: alexandra t.

customer_reviews.title: Saved a whole lot of Misery and Heartache for my Son
customer_reviews.text: Great product, swabbed child and father and sent it off on a Monday morning results were in email Wednesday evening. Fast service and saved my Son a lifetime of misery from a Lying, Dishonest cheating female that was prepared to take him for everything he had in his Life.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

product_meta.title: DNA Direct Paternity Test Kit - All Lab Fees & Shipping to Lab Included - Results in 2 Business Days
product_meta.description: The DNA Direct Home Paternity Test INCLUDES ALL LAB FEES for testing an alleged father and child. The DNA Direct Home Paternity kit is delivered to your door and includes cheek swabs, instructions, and a Free Return Mailer to the laboratory. Testing is 100% accurate. Discounts available if additional legally binding paternity testing is required. The accredited DNA testing laboratory is based in the USA. Paternity testing takes as little as 2 business days. Register online to receive your results. If you have questions about your paternity test results, a phone number and email are included in your kit. You will be able to print a copy of the paternity test results as soon as they are emailed to you. Due to New York State Law, this at-home DNA collection kit cannot be mailed to New York addresses.
feature_bullets: All Lab Fees Included for 1 Father and 1 Child. Testing Performed by an AABB & ISO 17025 Accredited Laboratory.
The DNA Direct Home Paternity Test INCLUDES 22 GENETIC MARKERS FOR 100% ACCURACY. Results completed in as little as 2 business days.
Kit includes FREE Return Shipping back to the Laboratory. Register your kit online to receive your results.
Professional and Confidential. Ships in discreet packaging for privacy. Phone Number Available for Questions.

Kit includes PAIN-FREE cheek swabs for sample collection in the comfort and privacy of your home. DNA Direct cannot send at-home collection kits to New York addresses. New York State Law requires that residents either obtain a court order or include a physician to complete the testing process.
